sentences.en: Drizzle them with warmed extra virgin olive oil.
sentences.cn: 将加热过的特级初榨橄榄油淋在上面。

sentences.en: Have you ever been to a virgin forest?
sentences.cn: 你去过原始森林 吗 ?

sentences.en: Hey ploughed nearly 100,000 acres of virgin moorland.
sentences.cn: 他们犁了将近10万英亩未开垦的高沼地。

sentences.en: I was a virgin until I was thirty years old.
It was on 24th June 1981 that young villagers first reported seeing the Virgin Mary in a vision.
sentences.cn: 1981年6月24日那天，年轻的村民们首次报告说看到了圣母马利亚的幻象。

sentences.en: It was on the Virgin label.
sentences.cn: 它由维京唱片公司发行。

sentences.en: The young people have claimed almost daily visitations from the Virgin Mary.
sentences.cn: 这些年轻人说几乎每天都会看到圣母马利亚显圣。

sentences.en: Then he added, " Blessed Virgin, pray for the death of this fish.
sentences.cn: 然后他加上了两句: “ 万福童贞圣母, 请您祈祷叫这鱼死去.

sentences.en: Until he appeared in "In the Line of Fire" Malkovich had been an action-movie virgin.
sentences.cn: 出演《火线狙击》以前，马尔科维奇从未演过动作片。
维珍公司富有冒险精神的创始人理查德∙布兰森

sentences.en: Within 40 years there will be no virgin forest left.
sentences.cn: 过不了40年原始森林将所剩无几。
